rules_text:
[i]Pawn of Tattarah[/i] – As Delthea, Duma's Prodigy enters, choose instant or sorcery.
[i]Magic Prodigy[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, each opponent loses 2 life.
[i]Darkness Rising[/i] – When Delthea dies, return a card of the chosen type from your graveyard to your hand.
